title: "What secrets of the philosophers are revealed in this ancient text?"
first_phrase: This text delves into various philosophical ideas related to alchemy and the nature of the universe. It highlights the thoughts of different philosophers like Danao, Eximigano and Nostio. Danao talks about the duration of time required for certain processes in alchemy. Eximigano provides the reader with a formula for alchemic transformation using words like black, white and red. Nostio provides his take on the concept of creation and reproduction in nature. These ideas are a part of the broader theme of alchemy, and show how philosophers of the time tried to understand and explain the workings of the world.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the process of transforming the base metal into the regal and philosophic Gold-Sun requires first neutralizing and dissolving the vulgar Gold under the Moon's domain before Mercury reintegrates it. The powers associated with the Sun in the human composite will then "vest" and "tinge" its fellow limbs in red, initiating the alchemical transmutation. Remember, everything is one, and correction is only possible through its nature and seed. With these words, all the answers are there.
